attributes.additional_details:
Private 'investors' are-ready-to 'sponsor' projects 'ignored' by local-authorities; State 'adopt' buildings FOR-FREE after an agreed-period.

Building an-underground grit & spreaders facility below Chorlton [Manchester] communal-park creates facilities desperately-needed though funding is-an-issue,

Akin libraries, museums... left-by Victorians 21st-century entrepreneurs keen-to-exploit 'publicity'.
